NI Web Server VIs

Owning Palette: Web Services VIs

Requires: Full Development System (Windows 64-bit). This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the NI Web Server VIs to support Web services deployed to the NI Web Server.

Note  This topic assumes familiarity with the Web services introduction and tutorial.
Palette ObjectDescription
Get Auth Details for NI Web ServerReturns the authentication details associated with the current HTTP request. The authentication details indicate which user account is logged in to the NI Web Server.
